SELECT u.expiration_time, u.remaining_times, u.type, u.`name`, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), ifnull((SELECT monthly_number from product where type = 1 and deleted = 0),0) - ifnull(l.dayRemainingTimes,0) as dayRemainingTimes FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(1) as dayRemainingTimes,user_id FROM use_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} and use_type = 2 and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= curdate() GROUP BY user_id) l on l.user_id = u.id
where u.id = #{userId}

SELECT ifnull( u.dayUserNumber, 0 ) AS dayUserNumber, ifnull( o1.dayOrderNumber, 0 ) AS dayOrderNumber, ifnull( o2.dayOkOrderNumber, 0 ) AS dayOkOrderNumber, ifnull( o3.dayPrice, 0 ) AS dayPrice, ifnull( u1.expirationNumber, 0 ) AS expirationNumber FROM ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS dayUserNumber FROM `user` WHERE date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE()) u, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS dayOrderNumber FROM t_order WHERE date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE()) o1, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS dayOkOrderNumber FROM t_order WHERE date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE() AND state = 1 ) o2, ( SELECT sum( price ) AS dayPrice FROM t_order WHERE state = 1 AND date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE()) o3, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS expirationNumber FROM `user` WHERE date_format( expiration_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = CURDATE()) u1
